properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 8 at 9:07AM CST until January 9 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt. Waves 6
to 11 feet possible.

* WHERE...All of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
